entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: NW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
